page.title: 20 CAR BREAKERS
page.content: One of the most remarkable sights to be seen in such a tiny,quiet village as{Ramsden Heath}is the sight of large lorries,laden with the{ {wreckage}of motor cars,travelling slowly down the main street.Not too strange perhaps,until they turn into a narrow drive in Downham Road,not 400 metres from the village triangle,to return empty a few minutes later.The reason is as simple as it is surprising.There are five motor breaking yards at the top of{Windsor Road,where the surviving parts are cannibalised for the use of private motorists.So many parts are available that Ramsden Heath is known all over the county of Essex as{the}place to go for second hand spare parts for any make of car,even the less common models.
